name: voting-stimmunterlagen-offline
description: The client is used to generate voting cards by input files which are delivered by the `Swiss Post`.
author: Abraxas Informatik AG

scripts.electron:serve: wait-on tcp:4200 && npm run tsc-electron && electron . --serve
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run ng:serve" "npm run electron:serve"
scripts.build: npm run tsc-electron && ng build --base-href ./ -c production
scripts.build-backend: cd ../backend && dotnet publish ./tools/ZipTool -c Release -o ./dist/ZipTool /p:ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true /p:EnableSourceLink=false /p:SuppressImplicitGitSourceLink=true && dotnet publish ./tools/CryptoTool -c Release -o ./dist/CryptoTool /p:ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true /p:EnableSourceLink=false /p:SuppressImplicitGitSourceLink=true && dotnet publish ./tools/EchDeliveryJsonConverter -c Release -o ./dist/EchDeliveryJsonConverter /p:ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true /p:EnableSourceLink=false /p:SuppressImplicitGitSourceLink=true && dotnet publish ./tools/VotingCardGenerator -c Release -o ./dist/VotingCardGenerator /p:ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true /p:EnableSourceLink=false /p:SuppressImplicitGitSourceLink=true && dotnet publish ./tools/PdfMerger -c Release -o ./dist/PdfMerger /p:ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true /p:EnableSourceLink=false /p:SuppressImplicitGitSourceLink=true && cp -R ./tools/3rdPartyTools ./dist/3rdPartyTools/
scripts.create-package: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend && npm run add-licenses && workDir=packages/voting-stimmunterlagen-offline-win32-x64 inputFiles=. hashFile=../release_artifacts.sha256 npm run create-hashes && npm run compress-package && workDir=packages inputFiles=./voting-stimmunterlagen-offline-win32-x64.zip hashFile=./voting-stimmunterlagen-offline-win32-x64.zip.sha256 npm run create-hashes
